extendedInfo.description: *Lists over 1000 drugs!*Fast and easy access to informationDialysis Drug List App is the perfect tool for anyone in need of quick access to an extensive list of medications and their interactions with dialysis. The application provides a comprehensive database that interprets whether drugs should be administered with dialysis. The information is presented in a user friendly format and provides yes and no answers to the question, "Can this medication be administered with out being significantly removed by dialysis?" We always look forward to hearing from our users. Please feel free to provide us with feedback.Disclosure: The data provided by this app must be confirmed prior to use, and it is not a substitute for clinical judgement. The creators of this app shall not be liable for any special, consequential, or exemplary damages resulting in whole or part from any user's use of or reliance upon this material.
